description: [GrimAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0632) has used Accept-Language to identify hosts in the United Kingdom, United States, France, and Spain.(Citation: Group IB GrimAgent July 2021)

external_references.description: Priego, A. (2021, July). THE BROTHERS GRIM: THE REVERSING TALE OF GRIMAGENT MALWARE USED BY RYUK. Retrieved July 16, 2021.
